Name: Mahjong Carnaval
About the game: Help the countess find unique masks! Become a real detective of the 'Ancien Régime'! What hides behind the Mahjong tiles? Find the rarest masks by visiting carnivals around the world! The finest places of the world will spin you around in the melodies of carnivals and leave you with indelible impressions of visiting these famous festivals! Varied Brazil, ancient Asia, and indigenous Africa – these are just the beginning of a great romantic adventure 1. Find the rarest masks! 2. Travel to the most striking festivals of the world. 3. More than 100 original levels. 4. Truly magnificent trophies. 5. An 18th century carnival atmosphere! 6. Enchanting music, carrying you backwards in time.
